abstract: The Ambac Financial Group, a bond insurer, said Wednesday that its chief risk officer had resigned. The executive, William T. McKinnon, left on Feb. 8, the company said in a regulatory filing.
lead_paragraph: The Ambac Financial Group, a bond insurer, said Wednesday that its chief risk officer had resigned. The executive, William T. McKinnon, left on Feb. 8, the company said in a regulatory filing.
